hopobject.name: angstrom
hopobject.body: Ångström was started by a small group of people who worked on the OpenEmbedded, OpenZaurus and OpenSimpad projects to unify their effort to make a stable and userfriendly distribution for embedded devices like handhelds, set top boxes and network-attached storage devices and more.
hopobject.shortdesc: A distribution tailored for embedded devices.
